Class RegularSoldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimulationObject
      • Soldier
        • RegularSoldier

  • public class RegularSoldier
extends Soldier
    Regular soldier class inherits from abstract soldier class for code reusing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularSoldier(java.lang.String name, Position position)
      Constructor Initiates abstract soldier class with the following parameters: SoldierType: Regular CollisionRange: 2.0 ShootingRange: 20.0 Speed: 5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for searching soldier.
      void shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, If closest zombie, change state to aiming, If not, pick random direction and change state to searching
      void step(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides step method in the simulation object class

      • searchingSoldierStep

        public void searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
        Step calculation for searching soldier. Move the soldier, try to find closest soldier If there is a closest soldier, change state to aiming
        Specified by:
        searchingSoldierStep in class Soldier
        Parameters:
        controller - simulation controller

      • shootingSoldierStep

        public void shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
        Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, If closest zombie, change state to aiming, If not, pick random direction and change state to searching
